program.name: VolumeCalculator
program.description: Calculate the volume of a box

positionalArgument.name: length
positionalArgument.description: length the length of the box

positionalArgument.name: width
positionalArgument.description: width the width of the box

positionalArgument.name: height
positionalArgument.description: height the height of the box

optionalArgument.name: --digits
optionalArgument.description: the amount of digits in the volume
